title: API Response Caching & Client-side Persistence
content:
Definition:
Caching means storing API responses to avoid repeated calls.

Use:
Used for dashboards, product catalogs, news feeds, etc.

Importance:
Reduces server load, speeds up UI, and improves UX.

Major Use & Advantages:
Fast navigation, offline capability, reduced API cost.
examples: Cache product lists to avoid repeat fetches
Persist last search results for quick back nav
Use stale-while-revalidate for fast perceived loading
